info.name: TARDIS Home Icon w/ options - Tumblr
info.description: A simple change of the home icon.  No message changes, no other anything, just a home icon.  Two options for the image.
info.additionalInfo: Based on this theme without the bowtie, because it was broken and because it's a bit Eleven-centric, and I am a Nine fan until I die. Option for also using the slightly-different TARDIS image from this theme.
